post.body: accidentally replied to 40404? I imagine that could be deliciously tragic, depending on the intended recipient.
will do!
where are the patches to coherence for that? I dug through Trac, the ML, and svn, but couldn't find any reference to you.
Just met the best taxi driver ever. He offered to pick us back up from the airport at the same rate, which is unheard of around here.
Dollar at 0.681 against the Pound. Buy Sterling, it can only go up from here.
After roaming much of Journal Square and downtown, I finally found an open florist, only to realize I have no sense of color composition.
Every rental car in NJ is rented except for the ones at Enterprise, and I'll be damned if I'm paying an extra $100 for being 24.
My dad now uses Skype. This would be awesome on so many levels if Skype consistently worked.
Either the routes coincidentally line up or Google Transit actually knows the NJTransit holiday schedule. Bravo, Google developers.
Heading to Vernon to spend Christmas day with my dad, then back in the late evening to attend to the dog.
Trying to find a way to sync the GMail address book against a LDAP server as syncing the Blackberry with it would probably require BES.
getlibs (from Ubuntu Forums) strikes me as having the same level of utter insanity as Automatix. Discuss.
Forced to spend $60 shipping my visa application literally around the corner, and it still wont arrive until 9:30am tomorrow. Excited though
Biometrics done, waiting for the train to New York Penn.
I'm wearing four layers and I'm still freezing.
Up at ridiculous o'clock to do a final review of my papers, then off to Newark for biometrics, then NYC to hand deliver my application.
Dear UPS, I know it's a busy day for you, but deliver my uk visa documents already so I can shower without fear of missing you. kthxbi
Any place that plays Minus the Bear while I wait to get my hair cut is a winner in my book.
Getting my hair cut with polynomials.
Fun party, but I'm exhausted. Bedtime.
